ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board
Class GameBoardDiagonal

java.lang.Object
  ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board.GameBoardSlotCollection
      ch.hszt.connectfour.model.board.GameBoardDiagonal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serial, java.lang.Iterable<GameBoardSlot>
public class GameBoardDiagonal
extends GameBoardSlotCollection

Represents a model-based diagonal on the GameBoard.

Version:
1.0, 11.10.2011
Author:
Markus Vetsch

Constructor Detail

GameBoardDiagonal

GameBoardDiagonal(GameBoardSlot start,
                  boolean searchDown)
Creates a new GameBoardDiagonal with specified GameBoardSlot as start point.

Parameters:
start - - The starting point of the GameBoardDiagonal.
searchDown - - true, if diagonal shall be built in down right direction; otherwise, diagonal is built in up right direction.
Method Detail

isValid

public static boolean isValid(GameBoardSlot start,
                              boolean searchDown)
Evaluates, if a valid GameBoardDiagonal can be created from given starting point as GameBoardSlot in specified search direction

Parameters:
start - - The starting point of the evaluation as GameBoardSlot.
searchDown - - true, if diagonal shall be built in down right direction; otherwise, diagonal is built in up right direction.
Returns:
true, if the diagonal is valid, i.e. contains >= MINIMUM_LENGTH GameBoardSlot instances .

getLength

int getLength()
Returns the length of current GameBoardDiagonal.

Returns:
The length of the GameBoardDiagonal, which is equal to the amount of GameBoardSlot instances on it.

IsIdenticalWith

boolean IsIdenticalWith(GameBoardDiagonal other)
Evaluates, if this GameBoardDiagonal is identical with the GameBoardDiagonal specified in the argument.

Parameters:
other - - The GameBoardDiagonal to be checked for identity.
Returns:
true, if both instances are identical, i.e. define a GameBoardDiagonal with same start and end GameBoardSlot in either direction.
